title: Speaking in Front of Others
description: Ahmed talks about overcoming his fear of public speaking and gaining confidence.
speaker: Ahmed
text: For a long time, I was afraid of speaking in front of other people.
Even simple presentations made me feel nervous and uncomfortable.
Last year, my team asked me to present our work at a small meeting.
At first, I wanted to avoid the situation, but I knew it was an important opportunity.
I decided to prepare carefully and practice several times at home.
On the day of the presentation, my voice was not very strong, but I continued speaking.
As I moved forward, I felt more relaxed and confident.
After the meeting, my colleagues gave me positive feedback.
Since then, I have tried to speak more in meetings and challenge my fear.
This experience taught me that confidence grows with practice.
